sentences.sContent: Yes, I’ll be there. Thanks for reminding me.
sentences.sCn: 是的，我会去那里的。 谢谢提醒。

sentences.sContent: He made a few notes to remind himself of what he wanted to say.
sentences.sCn: 他记了几条，提醒自己要说些什么。

sentences.sContent: ...But in the same breath will remind you that it is the most important decision of your life...
...Many proverbs remind people of the values that are important in the culture...
...Heidrich now visits websites that discuss gaming addiction regularly to remind myself to keep my love for online games in check...

remMethod.val: re ＋ mind(注意) → 使注意 → 提醒， 使想起

trans.tranOther: to make someone remember something that they must do
